This contains references for shadcn/ui chart documentation and gallery examples.

- [Chart](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/base/chart): Data visualization components for charts and graphs.
- [Charts - Area](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/area): Area chart examples and variants.
- [Charts - Bar](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/bar#charts): Bar chart examples and variants.
- [Charts - Line](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/line#charts): Line chart examples and variants.
- [Charts - Pie](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/pie#charts): Pie chart examples and variants.
- [Charts - Radar](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/radar#charts): Radar chart examples and variants.
- [Charts - Radial](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/radial#charts): Radial chart examples and variants.
- [Charts - Tooltip](https://ui.shadcn.com/charts/tooltip#charts): Tooltip patterns for charts.
